story.text: The pact of certain individuals with humanity, or larger systems can be created in block-chain, so as to guarantee the deposit of certain funds into perpetual trusts for what that individual believes to be the public good.

item.text: The pact of certain individuals with humanity, or larger systems can be created in block-chain, so as to guarantee the deposit of certain funds into perpetual trusts.

The pact of certain individuals with humanity, or larger systems can be created in block-chain, so as to guarantee the deposit of certain funds into perpetual trusts for what that individual believes to be the public good.
